title: Gamepad for VR
description:
Requires install and run this app on both phones: VR Headset phone (new device) and VR Gamepad phone (old device)


â˜† Gamepad for VR (virtual reality) is application that make your phone become a VR Controller, help you control your VR Headset phone via Bluetooth.
â˜† This application will create a bridge between two phones, one for VR Headset phone and other one for VR Gamepad phone
â˜† Gamepad for VR is compatible with Samsung Gear VR, Google Cardboard and other VR Headset devices
â˜† This application using a standard gamepad layout so it will be compatible with a large amount of games. You can play a lot of VR games on Google Play with this application.

How to use:
â–º Requires 2 phones to work, one for VR Gamepad phone (VR controller) and other for VR Headset phone (running VR games)
â–º Install and run this application on both of phones
â–º Pair 2 phones via Bluetooth, change the Default input method of keyboard (watch the instruction video) then enjoy the game.

Note:
- If this app not work well, Restart this app on both phones and try again
- This application using standard gamepad layout, so it may not support for some special games.
- In some special games, only some keys was support (up/down/left/right, jump, fire, reload...)
